group_1.narration: I couldn't sleep on our last night at the@Azalea House, so I went for a walk...
My name is Kyubey. @I came here to ask a favor of all of you.
At first, I doubted what I saw.@But I quickly accepted it to be real.@Or rather...I had no choice but to accept it,@because I could not prove otherwise.
I accepted that Kyubey was real...@Then Hazuki and Ayame showed up.

group_1.textRight: So basically, you're involved with those, um...

group_1.textLeft: Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: And you search for people who can become@one?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textRight: And if you become a Magical Girl, you can@get any wish granted...right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I can grant anything, any miracle you@desire.

group_1.textRight: I'll do it, I'll do it! I wanna be a Magical@Girl!
If I become one, Azalea House'll never@go away!
Hold your horses, Ayame!
Huh...?[chara:302801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]
If you become a Magical Girl, doesn't that@mean you have to fight?
We'd have to fight those "Witch" things...

group_1.textLeft: Yes. That is a Magical Girl's duty.

group_1.textRight: I'm not so sure about that part...
Yes... This stinks to high heaven.

group_1.textLeft: Certainly, there are many possible@outcomes. That I can't deny.
That's just how fate works.

group_1.textRight: B-but...you can get ANYTHING you wish@for, right?

group_1.textLeft: That's correct, Ayame Mikuri. Anything @at all...

group_1.textRight: Konoha...Hazuki... I wanna do it!

group_1.textLeft: Listen up, you two.

group_1.textRight: Okay...

group_1.textLeft: I want to protect the Azalea House. With@all of my heart...

group_1.textRight: I do, too.
Me too, me too!

group_1.textLeft: But there was nothing we could do...@We couldn't save our home.

group_1.textRight: *Sob*
Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: If I can have a wish granted by becoming a@Magical Girl...
No, I won't dance around it. I don't care@what it takes!
I'll do anything, so long as it saves the@Azalea House!

group_1.textRight: Konoha...

group_1.textLeft: So I'll make the contract with you@regardless of the consequences!
But what are Magical Girls, really? What@even is a Witch?
I'm plunging ahead into total darkness.@It all feels so far removed from reality...
I feel like we shouldn't be sticking our@necks out like this.
But I am still going to do it... If I can@protect this place, I'll do it!
If that is your wish, then I will grant it.
However, I'm going to be the only one@taking this risk.

group_1.textRight: Huh?! Just you, Konoha?

group_1.textLeft: I will be the only one to make a contract.@I don't want you two to get involved.
We only need one wish to save the Azalea@House.

group_1.textRight: Come on, we've stuck together this whole@time, haven't we?
You still don't get it...
There's no way I'd let you do something like @this alone!

group_1.textLeft: Hazuki, don't you understand? There's a@catch to this deal...

group_1.textRight: I know it has a catch. Hey, there is one,@isn't there?

group_1.textLeft: There is no catch. It is what it is.@I've described it plainly.

group_1.textRight: O-oh, okay. Thanks. That answer clears@it all up.

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad we understand each other.

group_1.textRight: Okay? That's why I can't just leave you@to make a contract alone, Konoha.
There's no way I could!
Ayame, you get it too, don't you?
Right! It's no good! The worst! It can't be@just Konoha!

group_1.textLeft: You two...

group_1.textRight: Even if you try to stop me, I'll make a@contract anyway.
Me too, me too!

group_1.textLeft: You don't plan on listening to a word I say,@do you?

group_1.textRight: No way!
Not a word!

group_1.textLeft: You're sure, then?

group_1.textRight: Absolutely...@We can stay together this way.
Yeah, yeah, yeah! We're stickin' together!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you...

group_1.textRight: I'm glad all three of you decided to make@a contract with me!
Now, please tell me your wish.

group_1.narration: That wish will become your Soul Gem.
